mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id as productId, p.name as productName, pi.image_url as mainImageUrl, p.price as sellingPrice, p.description as briefDescription, p.sales as sales FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductImage pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id AND pi.is_main = true ORDER BY p.sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}

WITH RECURSIVE category_tree AS ( -- 初始查询：顶级类别 SELECT category_id, name, parent_id FROM Category WHERE parent_id = 0 UNION ALL -- 递归查询：所有子类别 SELECT c.category_id, c.name, c.parent_id FROM Category c INNER JOIN category_tree ct ON c.parent_id = ct.category_id ) SELECT c.category_id as categoryId, c.name as categoryName FROM Category c INNER JOIN ( SELECT ct.category_id as top_category_id, SUM(p.sales) as total_sales FROM Category_tree ct LEFT JOIN Product p ON p.category_id = ct.category_id WHERE ct.parent_id = 0 -- 只取顶级类别 GROUP BY ct.category_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT #{limit} ) top ON c.category_id = top.top_category_id

WITH RECURSIVE category_tree AS ( -- 初始查询：指定顶级类别 SELECT category_id FROM category WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} UNION ALL -- 递归查询：所有子类别 SELECT c.category_id FROM category c INNER JOIN category_tree ct ON c.parent_id = ct.category_id ) SELECT p.product_id as productId, p.name as productName, pi.image_url as mainImageUrl, p.price as sellingPrice, p.description as briefDescription, p.sales as sales FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductImage pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id AND pi.is_main = true WHERE p.category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM category_tree) ORDER BY p.sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT p.product_id as productId, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.stock, p.sales, p.category_id as categoryId, c.name as categoryName FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT id, image_url, sort_order, is_main FROM ProductImage WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY is_main DESC, sort_order ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ProductImage (product_id, image_url, sort_order, is_main, created_time) VALUES (#{productId}, #{imageUrl}, #{sortOrder}, #{isMain}, #{createdTime})
